name: VR KITCHEN GAME: KNIFE SKILLS IN COOKING
name_original: VR KITCHEN GAME: KNIFE SKILLS IN COOKING
description:
VR KITCHEN GAME: KNIFE SKILLS IN COOKING is an educational game developed by pqahcat. It was originally released in 2023.
VR KITCHEN GAME: KNIFE SKILLS IN COOKING is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
